explains: adj. 不关心的；无关的；无忧虑的

sentences.en: Young people are often unconcerned with political issues.
sentences.cn: 青年人对政治问题往往漠不关心。

sentences.en: Paul was unconcerned about what he had done.
sentences.cn: 保罗对自己所做过的事情并不在意。

sentences.en: He drove on, apparently unconcerned about the noise the engine was making.
sentences.cn: 他继续驾车前进，对发动机发出的噪声显然毫不在意。
